tweet: Being in business is about building client relationships, not selling product or services. #biztip
Get organised and manage your time properly. #biztip
Always remember to pay yourself first- you are not a free resource for your business. You too need to live. #biztip
Offer benefits to customers that are greater than the cost to them. #biztip
Include your email address on all offers you send out. Consider an exclusive address for each offer. For tracking. #biztip
